backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented UI features (AboutSection card condensing, spacing tweaks, font size changes) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and key implementation details for the AuraFlora app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme design tokens (colors, borders, sidebar, charts).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the AuraFlora Vite/React app, mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the app in CartProvider and composes all page sections (Navbar, Hero, About, Products, Gallery, Contact, Footer, CartDrawer).
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section displaying a brand story with an asymmetric layout, featuring three condensed feature highlight cards with decorative symbols, enlarged titles, and tightened paragraph spacing.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-out cart drawer showing cart items with quantity controls and subtotal, with a transition to CheckoutForm when the user proceeds to checkout.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutForm.tsx: Checkout form collecting customer name, email, and delivery address that constructs a pre-filled mailto URI to hello.auraflora@gmail.com and shows a confirmation state after submission.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders a contact section with a form that opens a mailto link on submission, plus displayed email, WhatsApp, and Instagram contact details with decorative background elements.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with the AuraFlora logo, smooth-scroll navigation links, social media icons (Instagram, WhatsApp), and contact details including email and phone numbers.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a masonry-style image grid of four botanical gallery items with hover zoom effects and a decorative blob background element.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background image, animated decorative blobs, large brand typography, a tagline, and two CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to the gallery and about sections.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, smooth-scroll nav links, a cart icon with item count badge, an enquiry CTA button, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product card with image, name, description, price, and an 'Add to Cart' button that shows a temporary confirmation state using the CartContext.
Defines a static array of 6 botanical products and renders them in a responsive grid using ProductCard components, with a styled section header.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides a React context for shopping cart state, supporting add/remove/update/clear operations with localStorage persistence and cart open/close UI state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, recreating it when the Internet Identity changes and invalidating dependent queries accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login/logout state, persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and defining Tailwind base styles, OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the AuraFlora brand palette, and reusable component classes like contact/checkout inputs and navbar frosted glass.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with AuraFlora brand colors (OKLCH), custom fonts, border radii, box shadows, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state version 3 for a luxury botanical atelier website, documenting implemented features like condensed feature bullets, tightened spacing, reduced font size, and WhatsApp contact numbers.
